content.raw:
I am getting a Qt error msg when a model is inserted in the editor:

~~~
Object::connect: No such slot gazebo::gui::CollisionConfig::OnGeometryChanged(const std::string &, const std::string &, const ignition::math::Vector3d &, const std::string &)
Object::connect:  (sender name:   'configWidget')
Object::connect:  (receiver name: 'CollisionConfig')
~~~

looks like its because the `OnGeometryChanged` slot has been replaced with one that doesn't have arguments
